question: 強力
sourceMnemonic: You have <kanji>strong</kanji> <kanji>power</kanji>. You are <vocabulary>strong</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>powerful</vocabulary>. Feel your <vocabulary>strength</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic:
This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. Since <ja>力</ja> has two on'yomi readings, here's a mnemonic to help you remember which one to use:

Nothing is as <vocabulary>strong</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>powerful</vocabulary> as the <ja><reading>きょう</reading>と</ja> <reading>lock</reading> (<ja>きょうりょく</ja>). It's a legendary lock produced in ancient <ja>きょうと</ja>, rumored to be the strongest lock in existence. What magical powers do you think lie behind the <vocabulary>strength</vocabulary> of the <ja>きょうと</ja> lock?
